metadata.synopsis: This voicebark plays when a player chooses to not give up Astarion to the Gur hunter.Speaker 1 is assumed to be the player who did this action, and speaker 2 may have an opinionated comment on the outcome.Astarion can be neither of the speakers.
metadata.how_to_trigger: With a companion in your party and Astarion at your camp, speak to the Gur Hunter in the Swamp, lie and say that you have no idea who Astarion is.PAD plays once the dialog ends.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: You protected a child-stealing vampire? Bold choice.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Let's hope it doesn't come back to bite me later.
